data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
My rationale for suggesting the PHP namespace is that it could
    support future Perl/PHP integration. At the moment I have only
    written PHP::Include which provides a facility for reading simple
    PHP configuration files from Perl. The framework inside PHP::Include
    could easily be extended to provide new grammars that parse more
    PHP.

    There is a great deal of opportunity to create Perl libraries for
    interacting with PHP applications/code...and a top level PHP
    namespace would be the logical place to put them.
